mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FOOD_TRUCK WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT FOOD_TRUCK_NO foodTruckNo, FOOD_TRUCK_USER foodTruckUser, DOM_NO domNo, DOM_NAME domName, FOOD_TRUCK_NAME foodTruckName, FOOD_TRUCK_START_TIME foodTruckStartTime, FOOD_TRUCK_END_TIME foodTruckEndTime, FOOD_TRUCK_DAY foodTruckDay, FOOD_TRUCK_CONTENT foodTruckContent, TB_FOOD_TRUCK.ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, TB_FOOD_TRUCK.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, FOOD_TRUCK_COUNT foodTruckCount, TB_FOOD_TRUCK.STATUS status, TB_FOOD_TRUCK.ADMIN_STATUS adminStatus FROM TB_FOOD_TRUCK JOIN TB_USER ON (FOOD_TRUCK_USER = USER_ID) JOIN TB_DOM USING (DOM_NO) WHERE ADMIN_STATUS = 'N' AND TB_FOOD_TRUCK.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FOOD_TRUCK_NO
SELECT DOM_NO domNo, DOM_NAME domName FROM TB_DOM WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FOOD_TRUCK ( FOOD_TRUCK_NO, FOOD_TRUCK_USER, DOM_NO, FOOD_TRUCK_NAME, FOOD_TRUCK_START_TIME, FOOD_TRUCK_END_TIME, FOOD_TRUCK_DAY, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, FOOD_TRUCK_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_TRUCKNO.NEXTVAL, #{ userId }, #{ domNo }, #{ foodTruckName }, #{ foodTruckStartTime }, #{ foodTruckEndTime }, #{ foodTruckDay }, #{ enrollDate }, #{ modifyDate }, #{ foodTruckContent } )

INSERT INTO TB_FOODTRUCK_FILE ( FILE_NO, REF_FTNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, UPLOAD_DATE, FILE_TYPE, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FTFNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_TRUCKNO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, SYSDATE, #{fileType}, #{filePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FOOD_TRUCK WHERE FOOD_TRUCK_NAME = #{ foodTruckName } AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO fileNo, REF_FTNO refFtno, ORIGIN_NAME originName, CHANGE_NAME changeName, UPLOAD_DATE uploadeDate, FILE_TYPE fileType, FILE_PATH filePath FROM TB_FOODTRUCK_FILE WHERE FILE_TYPE = '1'

SELECT FOOD_TRUCK_NO foodTruckNo, FOOD_TRUCK_USER foodTruckUser, DOM_NO domNo, DOM_NAME domName, FOOD_TRUCK_NAME foodTruckName, FOOD_TRUCK_START_TIME foodTruckStartTime, FOOD_TRUCK_END_TIME foodTruckEndTime, FOOD_TRUCK_DAY foodTruckDay, FOOD_TRUCK_CONTENT foodTruckContent, TB_FOOD_TRUCK.ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, TB_FOOD_TRUCK.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, FOOD_TRUCK_COUNT foodTruckCount, TB_FOOD_TRUCK.STATUS status, TB_FOOD_TRUCK.ADMIN_STATUS adminStatus FROM TB_FOOD_TRUCK JOIN TB_USER ON (FOOD_TRUCK_USER = USER_ID) JOIN TB_DOM USING (DOM_NO) WHERE ADMIN_STATUS = 'N' AND TB_FOOD_TRUCK.STATUS = 'Y' AND DOM_NO = #{ domNo } ORDER BY FOOD_TRUCK_NO
